TopicTitle: Looking for some help with Mods!!!

Articles.Content: Hi guys im fairly new to KSP and a PC. I need some help installing mods. Some mods i can install with no problem usually parts or saved ships. like spacetech or H.O.M.E. But when it comes to mods with plugins and stuff they never seem to work for me. Subassembly for 1 just doesnt seem to work at all for me. And the D.E.M.V rovers work ok but wheels are just buried in the ground and are unuseable i am using the newest update on a windows system and could really do with a little help??
This is generally a problem with overzealous security not letting a program load dll files (which plugins are), try adding exceptions to your security software for KSP.
